about_the_game:
One day, the human body country suffered from a large area of bacteria invasion, the alarm from the human immune security department was immediately sounded, and the immune guards who received the rescue news carried many weapons immediately rushed to the scene of the incident, trying to survive and annihilate the bacteria as the tide came.

Game features
■ The attack mode used in the game is automatic attack!
■ There are many areas in the game for players to play randomly, the rhythm is fast and not slow!
■ There are more than ten characters for players to play, each role has its own exclusive weapons, I believe there are always so many can let you adapt to!
■ Hundreds of upgrade options and weapons to choose from (knife, hammer, gun, scissors, etc.)!
■ Every time the tide of bacteria will continue to increase for tens of seconds, find a way to stick to it, in a limited time as much as possible to destroy the bacteria!
■ Pick up items dropped after destroying germs, and purchase or upgrade them when moving to the next area!
■ The game contains several different disease types of levels, each level has a unique play style, in a different type of disease to start your healing road!

■ The game contains several different disease types of levels, each level has a unique play style, in a different type of disease to start your healing road!
name: Keep Health!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580/AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670k/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680/AMD HD 7970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Keep Health! Is a regional arena type rogue-like game, players will become a defender in the game, control several weapons against a variety of germs. Get a variety of weapons and items in the game to strengthen the guards, so as to overcome difficulties and complete the breakthrough.
